description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。现任中共广东省委副书记，广东省人民政府省长、中共深圳市委书记。中共第二十届中央委员。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China. He is currently the Deputy Secretary of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the CCP, Governor of Guangdong Province, and Secretary of the Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the CCP. He is a member of the 20th Central Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省的省级行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level administrative organ of Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共广东省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as the Party Secretary of Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，孟凡利的前任广东省省长和深圳市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Meng Fanli's predecessor as Governor of Guangdong and Party Secretary of Shenzhen.

nodes.id: 中国共产党深圳市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党深圳市委员会
en: Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在深圳市的领导机关。
description.en: The leadership body of the Communist Party of China in Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共深圳市委副书记、市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as the Deputy Party Secretary and Mayor of Shenzhen.

nodes.id: 中国共产党包头市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党包头市委员会
en: Baotou Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在包头市的领导机关。
description.en: The leadership body of the Communist Party of China in Baotou.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任包头市副书记兼市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as Deputy Party Secretary and Mayor of Baotou.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替赵江涛任包头市副书记兼市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, succeeded Zhao Jiangtao as Deputy Party Secretary and Mayor of Baotou.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，孟凡利的前任包头市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Meng Fanli's predecessor as Party Secretary of Baotou.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，孟凡利的继任包头市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Meng Fanli's successor as Party Secretary of Baotou.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国青岛市的市级行政机关。
description.en: The municipal-level administrative organ of Qingdao, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共烟台市委书记和中共青岛市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, formerly served as Party Secretary of Yantai and Party Secretary of Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共青岛市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as Party Secretary of Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，孟凡利的前任青岛市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Meng Fanli's predecessor as Mayor of Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，孟凡利的继任青岛市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Meng Fanli's successor as Mayor of Qingdao.

nodes.id: 中国共产党烟台市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党烟台市委员会
en: Yantai Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在烟台市的领导机关。
description.en: The leadership body of the Communist Party of China in Yantai.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共烟台市委副书记、市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as the Deputy Party Secretary and Mayor of Yantai.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，孟凡利的继任烟台市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Meng Fanli's successor as Party Secretary of Yantai.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国烟台市的市级行政机关。
description.en: The municipal-level administrative organ of Yantai, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，孟凡利的前任烟台市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Meng Fanli's predecessor as Mayor of Yantai.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山东省的城市，是孟凡利的出生地。
description.en: A city in Shandong, China, and the birthplace of Meng Fanli.

en: Shandong University of Finance and Economics

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山东省济南市的一所财经类高等院校，孟凡利的母校及曾任职单位。
description.en: A university of finance and economics located in Jinan, Shandong, China. It is Meng Fanli's alma mater and former employer.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国天津市的一所著名综合性研究型大学，孟凡利的母校。
description.en: A famous comprehensive research university located in Tianjin, China, and Meng Fanli's alma mater.

en: Tianjin University of Finance and Economics

description.zh-cn: 位于中国天津市的一所高等财经院校，孟凡利的母校。
description.en: A university of finance and economics located in Tianjin, China, and Meng Fanli's alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民政府的组成部门，主管全省财政收支、财税政策等。
description.en: A component department of the Shandong Provincial People's Government, responsible for the province's fiscal revenue and expenditure, fiscal and tax policies, etc.

nodes.id: 山东省鲁信投资控股集团有限公司

zh-cn: 山东省鲁信投资控股集团有限公司
山东省鲁信投资控股有限公司
en: Shandong Luxin Investment Holdings Group Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 山东省的国有投资控股公司。
description.en: A state-owned investment holding company in Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民政府的组成部门，主管全省商务工作。
description.en: A component department of the Shandong Provincial People's Government, responsible for the province's commercial affairs.

nodes.id: 中国共产党广东省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党广东省委员会
en: Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leadership body of the Communist Party of China in Guangdong Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会
en: 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会选出的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leadership body elected by the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关，任期为2018年至2023年。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China, with a term from 2018 to 2023.

nodes.id: 中国共产党内蒙古自治区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党内蒙古自治区委员会
中共内蒙古自治区党委
en: Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在内蒙古自治区的领导机关。
description.en: The leadership body of the Communist Party of China in the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，孟凡利的前任中共内蒙古自治区党委副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Meng Fanli's predecessor as Deputy Party Secretary of Inner Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，孟凡利的继任中共内蒙古自治区党委副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Meng Fanli's successor as Deputy Party Secretary of Inner Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，孟凡利的前任山东省商务厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Meng Fanli's predecessor as Director of the Shandong Provincial Department of Commerce.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，孟凡利的继任山东省商务厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Meng Fanli's successor as Director of the Shandong Provincial Department of Commerce.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共广东省委书记，出席孟凡利就任深圳市委书记的干部会议。
description.en: Chinese politician, then Party Secretary of Guangdong, attended the cadre meeting for Meng Fanli's appointment as Shenzhen Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在孟凡利就任深圳市委书记的干部会议上宣读中央决定。
description.en: Chinese politician, announced the central government's decision at the cadre meeting for Meng Fanli's appointment as Shenzhen Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利出生于山东临沂。
description.en: Meng Fanli was born in Linyi, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利于1986年3月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Meng Fanli joined the Communist Party of China in March 1986.

description.zh-cn: 在山东经济学院会计系商业会计专业学习。
description.en: Studied commercial accounting in the Department of Accounting at Shandong University of Finance and Economics.

description.zh-cn: 在南开大学会计系西方会计专业在职攻读硕士研究生。
description.en: Pursued a master's degree in Western accounting in the Department of Accounting at Nankai University while working.

description.zh-cn: 在天津财经学院会计学专业在职攻读博士。
description.en: Pursued a doctorate in accounting at Tianjin University of Finance and Economics while working.

position.zh-cn: 会计系教师、财务会计系副主任、财务会计系主任
position.en: Teacher, Deputy Dean, and Dean of the Department of Accounting

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利毕业后留校任教并逐步晋升。
description.en: After graduation, Meng Fanli stayed at the university to teach and was gradually promoted.

position.en: Deputy Director, Party Leadership Group Member

relationships.target: 山东省鲁信投资控股集团有限公司

position.zh-cn: 副董事长、总经理、党委副书记；董事长、党委书记、总经理
position.en: Vice Chairman, General Manager, Deputy Party Secretary; Chairman, Party Secretary, General Manager

relationships.target: 中国共产党烟台市委员会
中国共产党包头市委员会
中国共产党内蒙古自治区委员会
中国共产党广东省委员会
中国共产党深圳市委员会
中国共产党第二十届中央委员会
第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利任广东省省长时，黄坤明任中共广东省委书记，是其直接上级。
description.en: When Meng Fanli was Governor of Guangdong, Huang Kunming was the Party Secretary of Guangdong, his direct superior.

position.zh-cn: 中共深圳市委副书记、市长
position.en: Deputy Secretary of Shenzhen Municipal Party Committee, Mayor

description.zh-cn: 覃伟中任深圳市长时，孟凡利任中共深圳市委书记，是其直接上级。
description.en: When Qin Weizhong was Mayor of Shenzhen, Meng Fanli was the Party Secretary of Shenzhen, his direct superior.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利接替王伟中担任广东省省长及深圳市委书记职务。
description.en: Meng Fanli succeeded Wang Weizhong as Governor of Guangdong and Party Secretary of Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利接替张院忠担任中共包头市委书记。
description.en: Meng Fanli succeeded Zhang Yuanzhong as Party Secretary of Baotou.

description.zh-cn: 丁绣峰接替孟凡利担任中共包头市委书记。
description.en: Ding Xiufeng succeeded Meng Fanli as Party Secretary of Baotou.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利接替张新起担任青岛市市长。
description.en: Meng Fanli succeeded Zhang Xinqi as Mayor of Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 赵豪志接替孟凡利担任青岛市市长。
description.en: Zhao Haozhi succeeded Meng Fanli as Mayor of Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利接替张江汀担任中共烟台市委书记。此前在烟台任市长时，张江汀是其上级。后在青岛任市长时，张江汀亦是其上级。
description.en: Meng Fanli succeeded Zhang Jiangting as Party Secretary of Yantai. Previously, when Meng was Mayor of Yantai, Zhang was his superior. Later, when Meng was Mayor of Qingdao, Zhang was also his superior.

description.zh-cn: 王浩接替孟凡利担任中共烟台市委书记。
description.en: Wang Hao succeeded Meng Fanli as Party Secretary of Yantai.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利接替王良担任烟台市市长。
description.en: Meng Fanli succeeded Wang Liang as Mayor of Yantai.

description.zh-cn: 张永霞接替孟凡利担任烟台市市长。
description.en: Zhang Yongxia succeeded Meng Fanli as Mayor of Yantai.

description.zh-cn: 在孟凡利就任深圳市委书记的领导干部会议上，时任广东省委书记李希出席并讲话。
description.en: At the leadership cadre meeting for Meng Fanli's appointment as Shenzhen Party Secretary, Li Xi, then Party Secretary of Guangdong, attended and spoke.

description.zh-cn: 在孟凡利就任深圳市委书记的领导干部会议上，张福海宣读了中央决定。
description.en: At the leadership cadre meeting for Meng Fanli's appointment as Shenzhen Party Secretary, Zhang Fuhai announced the central government's decision.
